title: Deep Brain Scan (+Weird, Highly Interruptible)
description: When you have time to study someone, you can read them more deeply than usual. Roll+Weird.

bullets: What unfinished business do you have, and with whom?
What is your deepest secret fear?
How could I really get my hooks into you?

outcomes.text: Ask 1. They have to answer frankly, from their character's point of view.
Their brain freaks out and they suffer Ψ-harm instead.

title: Eerie Presence (+Weird)
description: When you enter into a nonviolent situation, roll+Weird.

bullets: If anyone here is keeping a dangerous or troubling secret, their brain buzzes in your perception like an overheating light bulb. Ask the MC if anyone's does.
If anyone here is connected more deeply to the world's psychic maelstrom than normal, you can hear it whispering through them. Ask the MC if you can.

outcomes.text: If anyone here is afraid of me, their brain is a threat to me and I must **act under fire** to remain here. Ask the MC if anyone's is.

title: In-brain Puppet Strings (+Weird, Highly Interruptible)
description: When you have the time and opportunity to work on someone, you can put psychic puppet strings into their brain. Roll+Weird.

outcomes.text: Hold 3 against them. From then on, whenever you want, you can spend 1 of your hold to whisper an order directly into their brain. If they follow it, good. If they resist, they suffer Ψ-harm, but they don't need to obey and your hold is still spent.
Their brain freaks out and they suffer Ψ-harm instead.

title: The Maelstrom, Manifest
description: You can unleash the world's psychic maelstrom as a destructive physical force: environ=Ψ, close-far, can't be brought to bear on a specific target.

title: Autonomous Eye-spider Drone (hi-tech, valuable)
description: Whenever you choose, you can ask the MC where your autonomous eye-spider drone is, and what sights and sounds it's currently projecting into your console. You have no control over it other than to forget about it when you're not interested.

title: Babble Prism (hi-tech, valuable)
description: A glass device that allows you to converse with a strange unliving entity, a perpetual nonperson who is eager to help you, but has a vacant, unlearning point of view. It's an advisor, and gives you **insight**, but remind the MC to create it as a pinpoint threat.

title: Deep Earplugs (hi-tech, worn)
description: Protects the wearer from all Brain-picker moves and gear, and from many other sources of Ψ-harm.

title: Engineered Nerve Parasite (hi-tech, touch)
description: Apply to someone's skin. Embeds itself into their nerve pathways. From now on, simple proximity to them counts as the time and opportunity to work on them. (Applies to in-brain puppet strings and potentially to other moves and effects.)

title: In-eye Brain-lenses (hi-tech, worn)
description: For the wearer, casually watching someone for a moment counts as taking the time to study them. (Applies to deep brain scan and potentially to other moves and effects.)

title: Pain-wave Projector (1-harm ap, area, hi-tech, loud, reset)
description: Goes off like a reusable grenade. Hits everyone but you.

title: Psychic Crash Rig (hi-tech, valuable)
description: Wire someone up to it and you can induce them to open their brain to the world's psychic maelstrom. If a PC, they make the move; if an NPC, ask the MC what happens. While their brain's open, the crash rig acts as a technical source on their experience, and gives you **research**.

title: Psychic Overload Chamber (hi-tech, valuable)
description: You have an enclosed chamber that acts as a psychic antenna, giving you access to **augury**.

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Brain-picker moves and 2 Brain-picker gear. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get a **venue** and **wealth + it's always something**
Get a move from an unused playbook
